import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; // import EmployeeContext from "../../utils/employeeContext"; import API from "../../utils/API"; export const Employee = () => { const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]) function getEmployees() { API.fetchEmployees() .then(res => { setEmployees(res) // console.log(employees) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } useEffect(getEmployees, []) console.log(employees) const names = employees.name console.log(names) // const { employee } = useContext(EmployeeContext) return (

Welcome to EMPLOYOTRON 9001!

) } export default Employee
